devdoc.details: Implements migration functionality using a Merkle tree for verification and interacts with an ILocker contract.      Includes features such as pausing, owner control, and token refunds.

AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

params.nftId: The ID of the NFT that was already migrated.

EnforcedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is paused.

ExpectedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is not paused.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

params.nftId: The ID of the NFT for which migration failed.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

params.bonus: The amount of bonus MAHA tokens distributed.
params.nftId: The ID of the NFT issued to the user.
params.user: The address of the user who migrated.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params._merkleRoot: The Merkle root for verifying eligibility.

params._mahaLocked: The amount of locked MAHA tokens.

returns._0: bool Returns `true` if the lock is valid, otherwise reverts.

migrateLock(address,uint256,uint256,uint.details: Emits a `Migrated` event upon success.      Reverts with appropriate errors for invalid data or migration conditions.

params._endTime: The end time of the lock.
params._mahaBonus: The amount of bonus MAHA tokens to be distributed.
params._mahaLocked: The amount of MAHA tokens to be locked.
params._nftId: The ID of the NFT to be migrated.
params._stakeNFT: Whether to stake the NFT or not.
params._startTime: The start time of the lock.
params._user: The address of the user initiating the migration.
params.proof: The Merkle proof verifying the user's eligibility.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

refund(address).details: Transfers the entire token balance of the contract to the owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

togglePause().details: Only callable by the owner. Pauses or unpauses the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

updateMerkleRoot(bytes32).details: Only callable by the owner. Emits a `MerkleRootUpdated` event.

devdoc.title: MigratorMaha

AlreadyMigrated(uint256).notice: Thrown when attempting to migrate an already migrated NFT ID.

EndTimeExpired(uint256).notice: Thrown when the lock's end time is already expired or invalid.

InvalidMerkleProof(bytes32[]).notice: Thrown when an invalid Merkle proof is submitted.

InvalidTokenId(uint256).notice: Thrown when an invalid or zero NFT ID is provided.

InvalidZeroAddress().notice: Thrown when a zero address is provided where an address is required.

MigrationFailed(uint256).notice: Thrown when the migration process fails.

MerkleRootUpdated(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Event emitted when the Merkle root is updated.

Migrated(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Event emitted when a migration is successfully completed.

initialize(bytes32,address,address).notice: Initializes the contract with initial values.

isTokenIdMigrated(uint256).notice: Tracks whether an NFT ID has already been migrated.

isValidLock(address,uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Verifies the validity of a migration lock using the Merkle tree.

locker().notice: Address of the ILocker contract for lock creation.

maha().notice: Address of the MAHA token contract used for bonus distribution.

merkleRoot().notice: Merkle root used to verify the migration eligibility of users.

migrateLock(address,uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Facilitates the migration of locked assets.

refund(address).notice: Refunds the contract's token balance to the owner.

togglePause().notice: Toggles the paused state of the contract.

updateMerkleRoot(bytes32).notice: Updates the Merkle root used for migration verification.

userdoc.notice: This contract facilitates the migration of locked assets and distributes bonus MAHA tokens to eligible users.
